description:
Note: This product has been previously available. Please be careful to avoid making an unnecessary or redundant purchase.

Bonus costume for Mitsunari Ishida will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in all-new style.

■Content
Bonus Costume for "Mitsunari Ishida"

■How to use
You can change costumes from camp by selecting "Party" - "Select Costume".
name: Bonus Costume for "Mitsunari Ishida"
